name: ICE LONELY
description:
Our plant has been through many challenges. Sadly, Polar bears have become a symbol of global warming. Warming temperatures melt polar ice and force polar bear to strive for food and living. Can you try to save our lovely polar bear and keep them there longer?

Goal:
Hanging in there longer and get higher score.

Control:
Right Click: Move

Made for TRIJAM#191 in 2h56m.
